headline: Can Ulta Beauty's (ULTA) Holiday Promotions Reinforce Customer Loyalty as a Competitive Edge?
summary: Ulta Beauty recently launched major Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales, featuring up to 50% discounts on popular cosmetics, skincare, and haircare brands, with exclusive offers for loyalty members and a wide range of limited-time products available both in-store and online. A standout insight is that Ulta’s holiday events are powered by its loyalty program, which now includes nearly 46 million members and drives the vast majority of the retailer’s sales through strong repeat purchases and...
